nuggets.text: Integrates cutting-edge AI video models including VEO3, Kling, Nano Banana, Seedance, and Pixverse.
Generates videos from prompts, scripts, URLs, or audio files.
Offers 'Unlimited Cat' plan with 3,600 generative AI credits per month.
Allows creating up to 10 new custom avatars per month on the Unlimited plan.
Supports translation of videos into over 25 languages with automatic voice and lip-sync adaptation.
Generative video feature allows creating fully AI-generated videos without stock footage or uploads.
Provides 'Brand Kits' to store logos, colors, and fonts (up to Unlimited on top tier).
Supports export resolutions up to 1080p on paid plans.
Users can clone their own voice to use across videos forever.
Includes access to millions of stock video clips and music assets.
Free plan is limited to approximately 1 minute of video per week with watermark.
Supports converting blog posts into viral videos.
Zebracat uses a combination of open-source and proprietary AI technologies.
Zebracat says its AI technologies are developed by an in-house team of AI scientists and engineers.
Zebracat says it includes advanced models for text-to-speech.
Zebracat says it includes advanced models for AI visuals.
Zebracat says it includes advanced models for video generation.
Zebracat says its models are optimized to deliver fast, high-quality results for creators and marketers.
Zebracat says you own the publishing rights to the content you create with Zebracat.
Zebracat says it does not claim ownership of your videos.
Zebracat says media assets available in Zebracat include visuals, music, and voiceovers.
Zebracat says its media assets are either licensed or royalty-free.
Zebracat says users with a paid plan have full commercial rights to use their content.
Zebracat says you are free to publish, share, or monetize your videos without restrictions.
Zebracat says commercial use is allowed with any premium subscription on Zebracat.
Zebracat says marketing, paid ads, and business promotions require being on a paid plan for full commercial usage.
Zebracat says free plans are for personal or testing use only.
Zebracat says free plans do not include commercial rights.
Zebracat says being on a paid plan ensures you have the proper rights and licensing for full commercial usage.
Page has limited extractable facts about commercial usage beyond plan eligibility.
Zebracat says it employs robust security measures to protect your information.
Zebracat says it encrypts data in transit.
Zebracat says it encrypts data at rest.
Zebracat says its platform adheres to industry-standard best practices and regulations to keep data private and secure.
Zebracat says it performs regular security audits.
Zebracat says it uses continuous monitoring to help safeguard content from unauthorized access or breaches.
Zebracat says it adheres strictly to regulations such as GDPR and CCPA.
Zebracat says it implements robust security measures to protect user data.
Zebracat says it uses encryption of data in transit and at rest.
Zebracat says it is committed to transparency about data usage.
Zebracat says it provides users with control over their personal information.
Zebracat says it performs regular audits and updates to maintain high standards of data protection and compliance.
Zebracat says all the music available on Zebracat is fully copyrighted and cleared for use across all social media platforms.
Zebracat says its licensing agreements ensure you have legal rights to use its music without issues.
Zebracat says you can download a license for the specific music track used if you encounter a copyright claim.
Zebracat says submitting the track license to the platform where the claim occurred can resolve the issue and lift restrictions.
Page has limited extractable facts beyond music licensing and claim resolution steps.
Zebracat says it offers a free plan that gives you monthly credits to create AI-generated videos.
Zebracat says you do not need a credit card to sign up.
Zebracat says the free plan lets you start creating using basic voiceovers, visual templates, and standard video exports.
Zebracat says free credits reset every month.
Zebracat says free credits do not roll over.
Zebracat says you can preview certain premium features on the free plan, but full access requires a subscription.
Zebracat lists four workflows: Prompt to Video, URL to Video, Script to Video, and Audio to Video.
Zebracat says the Prompt to Video workflow can generate a video from a simple prompt or short text.
Zebracat says the URL to Video workflow can turn a URL into a video by automatically pulling content from the webpage.
Zebracat says the Script to Video workflow uses an uploaded or pasted script as the foundation and matches it with AI visuals, voiceovers, and effects.
Zebracat says the Audio to Video workflow pairs an uploaded audio file with relevant visuals and subtitles.
Zebracat says it offers three aspect ratios: 9:16, 1:1, and 16:9.
Zebracat says the AI Image visual type can generate a single AI-created image in one of 78 different visual styles.
Zebracat says enabling Character Consistency keeps the avatar visually consistent across all scenes.
Zebracat says you can set video duration with a slider and recommends 60 seconds for short videos.
Zebracat says you can choose a voice and language for narration, including options for standard and ultra-realistic AI voices.
Zebracat says captions can be toggled on or off and edited later in the video editor.
Zebracat says selecting a music mood lets the AI automatically pick a suitable track, or you can turn music Off.
Zebracat says Brand Assets can include your logo, color palette, and business name.
The pricing page states Zebracat provides access to cutting-edge AI models such as VEO3, Kling, Nano Banana, Seedance, and Pixverse.
The pricing page states Zebracat includes generative video creation that can create fully AI-generated videos without stock or uploads.
The pricing page states Zebracat offers limited AI avatars that use avatars from a public library.
The pricing page states creating your own digital twin and product presenters are not included in limited AI avatars.
The pricing page states Zebracat offers standard AI voices in 175+ languages.
The pricing page states Zebracat can translate videos into 25+ languages.
The pricing page states video translation adapts voice and lip-sync automatically.
The pricing page states custom avatars can be created from prompts, by cloning yourself as a digital twin, or by using an avatar to present a product.
The pricing page states once created, avatars are yours forever and usable in all your videos.
The pricing page states voice clones can be used in unlimited videos once created.
The pricing page lists enterprise features including API access, custom AI models, and advanced team roles and permissions.
The article states Google Veo is a video generation model from Google DeepMind that generates raw video footage.
The article states Google Veo can produce 1080p videos.
The article states Google Veo can understand text prompts and generate video from those prompts.
The article states Google Veo has watermarks and safety filters for responsible use.
The article states Google Veo maintains consistency across frames.
The article states Google Veo supports image conditioning and filmmaking controls.
The Help Center page is branded as "Help Center" and is hosted at help.zebracat.ai.
Page has limited extractable product facts because it is primarily a navigation hub.
The Help Center includes a category labeled "Legal & Licensing."
Page has limited extractable facts because it is a category listing rather than a detailed policy page.
Export resolution is up to 1080p for paid plans
Free plan exports contain a prominent watermark
Paid plans (Cat Mode, Super Cat) remove watermarks from videos
Cat plan is limited to 15 videos per month
Super Cat plan includes 40 videos per month
Unlimited Cat plan offers unlimited video generation
7-day money-back guarantee available if no video has been downloaded
Offers 15% discount coupon for some plans (e.g., via partner codes)
nuggets.note: Mentioned in reviews, subject to change

examples.title: Refund Eligibility
examples.snippet: If a user has subscribed but has not downloaded any video, they can request a full refund within 7 days of purchase.

nuggets.text: Integrates advanced AI video models to generate content from text prompts
Uses timeline-based editing for precise control over scenes
Supports converting blog post URLs directly into video content
Supports uploading audio files for video generation
Includes stock library with millions of clips and music tracks
Refunds are not provided for subscription periods that have already been paid if videos were downloaded
Subscription cancellation is immediate but access may continue until end of billing cycle
Paid plans grant rights for commercial use of generated videos
Free plan videos are intended for personal use or evaluation due to watermarks

examples.title: Refund Eligibility
examples.snippet: If a user has subscribed but has not downloaded any video, they can request a full refund within 7 days of purchase.

examples.title: YouTube Shorts Creation
examples.scenario: Creating a vertical video for social media
examples.snippet: Select 'text-to-video', write a detailed prompt, choose a visual style (e.g., Realistic), configure aspect ratio to 9:16 for Shorts, and export the final video.
